content: A great story that tugs at your heart strings. I’m responding because this hits close to home. My son Dallas, has a dachshund that lost the use of his hind legs because of an injury. The operation has been done and the Dr. gave Lyric, The dog, a 50/50 chance of recovery. Dallas is a disabled Vet and is Lyric’s full time nurse. What devotion you guys have to your pets.!!!
